name: Introduction
desc: Welcome to our Excel File Management Platform, designed to empower users in managing Excel projects efficiently. This documentation aims to provide a detailed understanding of the platform's features, ensuring that you can make the most of its capabilities, from collaborative editing to data visualization.

subs.name: Excel File Upload
subs.desc: Our platform allows you to seamlessly upload Excel files in a predefined format. This feature ensures that your data is structured and ready for analysis.

subs.name: Data Display
subs.desc: Visualize your data in a structured manner for easy interpretation. The platform organizes information in a user-friendly way, making it accessible and digestible.

subs.name: Form Population
subs.desc: Click on specific lines in your data to populate a form instantly. This feature enhances the user experience, eliminating the need for manual data entry.

subs.name: Data Editing and Saving
subs.desc: Edit and save your data directly within the platform. This feature simplifies the process of making changes and ensures that your data is always up to date.

subs.name: Data Download
subs.desc: Download your updated data in various Excel formats, providing flexibility in how you utilize and share your information.

name: User Management
desc: Welcome to our Excel File Management Platform, designed to empower users in managing Excel projects efficiently. This documentation aims to provide a detailed understanding of the platform's features, ensuring that you can make the most of its capabilities, from collaborative editing to data visualization.

subs.name: Personalized Accounts
subs.desc: Users can create individual accounts to personalize their experience and gain access to advanced project management features.

subs.name: Efficient Project Management
subs.desc: Create, organize, and manage your projects effortlessly, ensuring a structured workflow.

subs.name: SANDBOX Mode
subs.desc: Operate in a client-side mode with our SANDBOX feature, ensuring that all processes happen locally on your device. Your data remains private and secure.

subs.name: Security Measures
subs.desc: Our platform prioritizes the security of your data, implementing robust measures to safeguard your information.

subs.name: Seamless Editing Offline
subs.desc: Edit your Excel files offline, and once connected, synchronize your changes with the server effortlessly.

name: Collaborative Features
desc: Welcome to our Excel File Management Platform, designed to empower users in managing Excel projects efficiently. This documentation aims to provide a detailed understanding of the platform's features, ensuring that you can make the most of its capabilities, from collaborative editing to data visualization.

subs.name: Enhanced Collaboration
subs.desc: Create organizations to foster collaborative work environments, ensuring that teams can efficiently contribute to shared projects.

subs.name: Real-time Visibility
subs.desc: Experience real-time visibility of other online users working on the same project, enhancing collaboration and reducing conflicts.

name: Project Modes
desc: Customize the accessibility of your projects with different modes to suit your needs. Choose between public and private project modes based on your sharing and collaboration preferences.

subs.name: Public Projects
subs.desc: Make your projects accessible to the public, allowing for broader visibility and information sharing.

subs.name: Private Projects
subs.desc: Restrict access to specific users for heightened privacy and control over your project's content.

name: Sharing Options
desc: Tailor the sharing settings for your projects to control who can view and edit your content. Whether you're collaborating within a team or sharing information externally, our platform provides flexible sharing options.

subs.name: Viewing Only
subs.desc: Share your projects for viewing only, perfect for situations where you want to disseminate information without allowing modifications.

subs.name: Editing and Modifying
subs.desc: Enable collaborative editing by sharing projects for editing and modifying. Facilitate teamwork and collective project management.

subs.name: Collaborative Editing
subs.desc: Experience real-time collaborative editing, allowing multiple users to work on a project simultaneously. Enhance teamwork and productivity.
